approval_data.project_name: V-KYC recordings to be fetched for Audit requirements
approval_data.project_summary: Develop a portal/dashboard for V-KYC team leads to access and download V-KYC recordings for audit purposes.
project_goals: Provide easy access to V-KYC recordings for audit requirements.
Reduce dependency on IT for retrieving recordings.
approval_data.business_context: The V-KYC team currently relies on the IT data server team to provide recordings stored on the LTF ‘NFS(Network File System)’ server. This manual process is time-consuming and inefficient, especially for audit requirements.

requirements.description: A portal/dashboard shall be created for accessing V-KYC recordings.
Access to the portal shall be provided to V-KYC team leads and process managers.
All V-KYC recordings shall be available on the portal.
Recordings shall be searchable by LAN ID.
Recordings shall be searchable by date and month.
Users shall be able to upload a file (Excel or text) with up to 50 LAN IDs for bulk download.
The system shall trigger a backend API call to process the bulk download request.
Results of the bulk download request shall be displayed in a tabular format.
The table shall have pagination displaying 10 records at a time.
The system shall provide a 'Download All' option for bulk downloads.
Only 10 records at a time will be downloaded.
The access for the screen will be available to very limited users (only Team leaders).

functional_requirements: User authentication and authorization to access the portal.
Search functionality by LAN ID, date, and month.
Display of recording details (User ID, Call Duration, Status, Time, Date, NFS VKYC Upload Time).
Bulk download functionality (upload file, process request, display results, download option).
File upload support for CSV/TXT files.
non_functional_requirements: The portal should be accessible to authorized users only.
The system should handle a maximum of 50 LAN IDs per bulk download request.
The system should display results in a paginated table (10 records per page).
The system should download only 10 records at a time.
success_criteria: The portal is successfully deployed and accessible to authorized users.
Users can easily search and retrieve V-KYC recordings.
The bulk download functionality works as expected.
The system meets all functional and non-functional requirements.
constraints: Recordings are stored on the LTF ‘NFS(Network File System)’ server.
File upload will be csv/txt file.
The access for the screen will be available to very limited users (only Team leaders).
assumptions: The existing infrastructure (NFS server, network) is available and functional.
The backend API for processing bulk download requests will be available and functional.
risks: Network issues affecting access to recordings.
API failures during bulk download processing.

recommendations: Add more details about the backend API.
Specify the security measures for the portal.

identified_gaps: Detailed specifications of the backend API are missing.
Security requirements are not explicitly stated.
recommendations_for_completion: Define the API endpoints, input/output parameters, and error handling.
Specify security measures such as authentication, authorization, and data encryption.
Define performance metrics like response time and throughput.
